LanguageData.AbandonedColonyOutlander.label: abandoned colony
LanguageData.AbandonedColonyTribal.label: abandoned colony
LanguageData.AncientHeatVent.label: ancient heat vent
LanguageData.AncientHeatVent.description: Ancient ducts will regularly vent heat from an underground megastructure, dramatically raising the temperature of the surrounding area.
LanguageData.AncientQuarry.label: ancient quarry
LanguageData.AncientQuarry.description: This area was once mined for its natural resources, and the remains of the ancient quarry are still here.
LanguageData.AncientRuins.label: ruins
LanguageData.AncientRuins.description: The remains of an ancient settlement. These ruins may contain a wide variety of possible threats.
LanguageData.AncientRuins_Frozen.label: frozen ruins
LanguageData.AncientRuins_Frozen.description: The ruins of an ancient settlement, now encased in solid ice. These ruins may contain untold dangers.
LanguageData.AncientSmokeVent.label: ancient smoke vent
LanguageData.AncientSmokeVent.description: This area has a number of massive exhaust vents. An ancient mechanism buried deep beneath the earth will occasionally vent large amounts of smoke, blocking out the sun for days at a time.
LanguageData.AncientToxVent.label: ancient toxic vent
LanguageData.AncientToxVent.description: Massive toxic vents will regularly spew toxic fallout into the air. The vents connect to an ancient substructure buried deep beneath the earth.
LanguageData.AncientUplink.label: ancient uplink
LanguageData.AncientUplink.description: This area contains an uplink used for communication with a low orbit satellite. Hacking the uplink will reveal a hidden location in orbit.
LanguageData.Harbor.label: harbor
LanguageData.Stockpile.label: stockpile
LanguageData.Stockpile.description: This area contains an underground stockpile of resources. Be careful, some of the ancient defense systems may still be active.
